entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @fema By May 15, 2020, the United States will have over 2,000,000 confirmed Covid-19 cases, and most likely, by end of May, will have more cases than all the other countries in the World combined. Still Trump will be bragging about the good job he has done. Pitifully sad and shameful.
